biocontainers.name: mir-prefer
biocontainers.summary: microRNA PREdiction From small RNA-seq data

biotools.summary: Uses expression patterns of miRNA and follows the criteria for plant microRNA annotation to accurately predict plant miRNAs from one or more small RNA-Seq data samples of the same species.

bioschemas.name: miR-PREFeR
bioschemas.summary: Uses expression patterns of miRNA and follows the criteria for plant microRNA annotation to accurately predict plant miRNAs from one or more small RNA-Seq data samples of the same species.
